title.rendered: Eldorado Stone VinoWall secures double exposure with Sunset Magazine

content.rendered:
The Eldorado Stone VinoWall, now a permanent feature on the Sunset campus, was introduced at Sunset Celebration Weekend in June. More than 21,000 guests were able to enjoy the beauty of the VinoWall first-hand!

The VinoWall was also featured in Sunset’s August 2010 issue. Using the stunning photography of the VinoWall at Celebration Weekend, the VinoWall was featured in a beautiful full-page color spread. The article hails the VinoWall as Sunset’s “new wine nook” and highlights the Eldorado Stone Oyster Cut Coarse Stone profile on the VinoWall, which the Sunset editors selected for its authentic similarity to Limestone and its ability to complement the bar’s smooth finishes.
